about_the_game:
The Wave of Monké Demo is out now. Download it for free and play the first level of Monké's epic quest for higher evolution.

MAKE SURE TO CHECK OUT OUR REVIEW SURVEY AFTER PLAYING THE DEMO:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdxYiBmIivxzxxo5qWUAGkl2gA4ROrLueZcExhJx79uUmTMUA/viewform

Responses are highly appreciated and will help us improve the full game.

The Wave of Monké is a comedy-action third-person shooter RPG based on the “Reject Humanity, Return to Monké” meme. The game follows Monké, a bored gorilla who wants to become something more…a human. Travel the multiverse with the legendary laser guitar gun that will grant you evolutionary experience points whenever you kill an enemy.
